website_summaries.verdict: Thanks to its LTE support and solid call quality, the Samsung Galaxy Light stands as a good value for entry-level Android smartphones on T-Mobile.
pros: Solid feature set for the price

customer_reviews.title: Lasts and is very durable.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this phone daily for over two years. It is a good little phone. I use it for video calls, texting, emailing, and sending photos I take while out and about. It is clear when making phone calls, but best of all it is super durable. I have dropped it on concrete many times and even sat on it. I splashed water on it and it just keeps on going. I charge it at night and run it all day long. I put a holster case on it for wearing when outside, which made it more durable I am sure, but it is also a good size to put in a front jean pocket in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: Tn_momma

customer_reviews.title: Happy camper
customer_reviews.text: I hate the new generation of large smart phones. I have a tablet for when a big screen is preferred. I want my phone to be convenient to carry and I want it to easily fit in a pocket. I also want to be able to easily operate my phone with 1 hand. This phone meets all of my needs and it handles all of my apps, so I'm a happy camper. I just wish Samsung, or some other company still built a reasonably powerful phone in this size. Perhaps I'll order another as a backup for this one...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice, tiny little phone like the Galaxy Mini series ...
customer_reviews.text: Updated 08/12/2015 Summary: I bought a used/refurbished from a 3rd party seller. It's a nice, tiny little phone like the Galaxy Mini series ones. This phone is not recommended since it doesn't function well often. Pros: + Little/Nice/Light decent phone for basic tasks + Good quality display Cons: + Quad-core + 1GB RAM but quite slow + Buggy software: phone freezes sometimes, gets heated up often when using GPS + No software update (4.2.2 for tmobile version) + Apps cannot be moved to SD card + Small battery that doesn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Do

customer_reviews.title: Okay phone...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as a birthday goft for my Mom. She wanted a smart phone but did not need a data plan and this phone suits her needs. She likes the touch screen and the ease of texting. It was super easy to set up with her existing TMobile account online. The only issue is the reception. It isn't so great and at times it is difficult for her to hear me. It is not that big a deal since she does not use it often and had a landline at home. If she was away from home a lot it woudl be a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: MyoshiBomb

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone - Samsung Galaxy Light (T-Mobile)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my wife the Samsung Galaxy Light (T-Mobile) on Jan 13, 2014 ($169) and it has been the best phone purchase. Not only is the price very reasonable but the features are the same as on the more expensive Samsung G3 replacement, but is slightly smaller, has a newer OS and seems faster too. I also purchased the Eagle Cell Protective Cover for Samsung Galaxy Light/T399 - Retail Packaging - Black ($11.57) which has already protected the phone from a drop onto our tile floor in the kitchen. I would highly recommend this phone and protective cover to anyone looking for an upgraded Android phone.
customer_reviews.author: RY-ATL

customer_reviews.title: Just My Size
customer_reviews.text: I switched over from the HTC Amaze. The HTC Amaze died soon after a submitted my $650 payment; it no longer recognized the Sim card. I did a Google search and discovered this was a common problem with the HTC One as well. Anyway, the Samsung Galaxy Light does the job and it's much more affordable. I mostly use it for texting, checking email, mapping directions and idling on Facebook. Sometimes doing a simple Google search takes a while. This may seem silly to some, but the thing I like most about the Samsung Galaxy Light is that it fits comfortably in my hand and takes up minimal space in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen Louie

customer_reviews.title: Smart Investment.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this phone ten stars, but it only goes up to five stars. I have been so pleased with this phone. It has been virtually trouble free, takes such good photographs I gave my camera away, a front and back camera, a web cam, a voice recorder, games, and internet. I especially love it because it's thin and I can carry it on my belt without annoyance. Too many features for me to list. I personally feel this was one of the smartest investments I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Small but fast
customer_reviews.text: The screen is a bit smaller then my previous phone (HTC 3D) but the screen is sharper. It has a quad core processor that is fast. Has around 5GB of internal memory free and you can add a micro SD card to expand that. The phone has a very smooth feel with no sharp edges or corners. It has a physical home button that I like. I have not had the Phone long enough to comment on the battery or T-Moble service.
customer_reviews.author: megamind

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete before I got it
customer_reviews.text: This phone could not be updated because it was too old, and I just bought it in 2017. Didn't learn that until the refund date had passed. Battery ran down during sleep in just 8 hours. Without updates, Google play couldn't function, so it became useless.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McVay

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone after getting fed up with my old Samsung Exhibit II 4G. I wanted a phone that was faster (didn't freeze for 5 seconds before opening an application or making a call), with a screen that I could actually see in direct sunlight, and a battery that lasted more than 14 hours. The Samsung Galaxy Light is fantastic on all of the dimensions. Very fast and responsive with excellent battery life. LTE connectivity, which the Exhibit II didn't have, is an great plus. All for $60 less than the old phone. At $120, you can't find a better deal. I've had this for about a week now and am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Kogan

customer_reviews.title: Android IPod Touch
customer_reviews.text: Great bargain is you want an Android version of the IPod Touch. I use a fliptop phone with real buttons for ergonomic reasons. But I miss a few Android apps such as audiobooks, calorie counting, etc. I didn't want to pay Mspple for an Mypod Touch and start shopping at the MyTunes store and go into debt. So I bought this as a alternative. Happy
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 16 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: This phone is perfect for my 16 year old daughter. She is able to do everything she wants as far as storing music and using her apps and surfing the web, but I didn't have to pay the money for an iPhone. This phone has proven to be durable and reliable without needing to take out a home equity loan to pay for a teenagers phone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Price

customer_reviews.title: Super slow. Got so annoyed I had to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Super slow. Got so annoyed I had to get another phone. Two stars because it worked well for maybe two weeks
customer_reviews.author: Jsmomma

customer_reviews.title: One of only about 4 phones out there that is small enough to easily fit in your hand.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of smart phones are great, but try to find one that is small enough to fit in your hand anymore! This one is the same size as the small iPhones and has the advantage of being Android based. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Replacement cell phone
customer_reviews.text: My old phone stopped using the sim card & I needed the same model asap......so very satisfied & a bonus that it was sold on Amazon straight from Samsung! Thanks again, Amazon, for having what I need when I need it!!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Did try my SIM card and it works but it is not T-Mobile like it states
customer_reviews.text: Holding to use this as a back up. Did try my SIM card and it works but it is not T-Mobile like it states. It only recognizes Metro PCS. ???
customer_reviews.author: Dana Williams

customer_reviews.title: For me, this phone has not worked well. ...
customer_reviews.text: For me, this phone has not worked well. It frequently will not have reception. Cannot call or send text messages most of the time- even in WiFi areas. Messages come through days later. Other phones on the tmobile network will have service in the same spot that this phone does not. Contacts stops working frequently. I have replaced the sim card and tried other ways to boost service, and nothing lasts with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for those who enjoy having a smaller form ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for those who enjoy having a smaller form factor with all the bells and whistles of Android 4.x. I've bought these phones for my wife and two sons who have customized them to their personal tastes and the battery seems to last with light use for almost two full days. The screen is amazing and clear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Would have been better off buying a walkie talkie. I'm a cheap skate and i was trying to find something to get me by until i got my other phone fixed. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a smaller smart phone, this is the one.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a smaller smart phone, this is the one. Just what I wanted. Super nice and excellent price. It operates on the Android 4.2.2 (same operating system as the Samsung Galaxy IV).... I highly recommend the seller and the T-399 Samsung Galaxy Light for it's smaller size, as I don't want the bigger bulky phone on my belt.....(Personal preference).....
customer_reviews.author: Montie Nievar

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: My phone broke down suddenly , so this was an amazing very decent replacement , its great quality and Amazon had it on sale at a cheaper prize than T-Mobile store , im very happy with this phone has all the function I need and than some such as Netflix , Hulu+ , YouTube and so on .
customer_reviews.author: FunFact

customer_reviews.title: Does everything I need for unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Love it because it does everything I need a smart phone to do and at a nearly "disposable" price too. I could go through three or four of these a year for the price of one top of the line phone. I personally don't want or need a fancier smart phone, this is more than enough for web browsing, texting, youtubing, GPS etc.... Note that you need a micro-SIM card. My T-Mobile store helped me do that quickly and helped me transfer all the info from my old SIM, using the bluetooth technology on the phone, which I didn't even know it could do that... cool stuff.
customer_reviews.author: David Hou

customer_reviews.title: They sold me a defective phone.
customer_reviews.text: Although my daughter has this phone for a number of months now, sadly, it's been nothing but trouble since day one. She get dropped from the network signal all the time (and no is not T-mobile the issue here), it's very slow to respond to touches and freezes all the time. CLEARLY THIS WAS/IS A DEFECTIVE PHONE - VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED ;((
customer_reviews.author: Yisraeln

customer_reviews.title: suddenly shuts down- makes me feel like maybe it is a knock-off
customer_reviews.text: I hope this phone is authentic. It gets stuck and tired quickly, suddenly shuts down- makes me feel like maybe it is a knock-off. Admittedly, I am also disappointed with the service provider, and that taints my opinion of the phone, but even objectively, it was not a wise purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DevF

customer_reviews.title: Great enter level smartphone
customer_reviews.text: Great enter level smartphone. If you want to download allot of apps you'll find you are limited by the amount of phone storage. I had to remove facebook and limit the other apps I used.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Phone is basically the same as Galaxy mini. Great features and awesome speed with quad core processor. $240. @ T-Mobile store. I would recommend to anyone looking for an easy to use and set-up phone that will still fit in your pocket (A phone, Not a mini tablet). My spouse and I both love the phone. GREAT PRICE @ Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: All you need!
customer_reviews.text: My Samsung Gal 2 was stolen so I had been looking for a replacement. To buy with TMobile the Galaxy 4 and 5 were over $600. I wanted a phone which would let me check Pinterest, text easily and had fast Internet, but with the current technology I don't think that $600 was the best option for me. I am so glad I bought this phone instead. It has super fast internet, I can have a few apps (I only use about 7 normally), the camera is great for Instagram. The camera had poor reviews, but I thought the images are clear enough. I am so happy I bought this phone! I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Android Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my mom and she's had it for about 8 months. The phone came brand new as advertised. My mom is in her mid sixties and finds the phone easy to use. When she needs help trouble shooting, I can assist her. She's had no problems with the phone. Great features. I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Younge

customer_reviews.title: Some phones at triple this price have dualcore CPU and worse battery life
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding phone for the price. The battery life is outstanding, and it has a quadcore CPU. Some phones at triple this price have dualcore CPU and worse battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this phone. Many told me not to get it. they had never heard of this phone. It is the best phone I have ever owned, it does everything I need it to and it is very fast. We actually bought two. One for me and the other for my fiancé. He too said it is better than his HTC phone that he had.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Larson

customer_reviews.title: best little phone ever
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and although its 'smaller' than other smartphones, you don't feel it. The seller is great, it is a brand new item in factory packaging, and they it shipped way before expected delivery date. AND the best part is...less expensive than store price.
customer_reviews.author: gigi hart

customer_reviews.title: Mom loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite an S4 or S5. But it's a good smart phone for casual use. If yo have a job where you need to pull a lot of e-mail this may not be a good fit. However, for your average consumer this is a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Fae Kname

customer_reviews.title: Good/Works/fairly fast.
customer_reviews.text: It works good, case is a little cheap, and after 8 months, managed to break the screen, which I have since fixed, but it works good, and I do like it. It is fairly speedly, and serves a nice phone as well as PDA/Smart device.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good: LTE, right size, Android Jelly Bean, good battery life if you turn off GPS Negative: Resolution nothing special and display poor compared to an iphone 5 Overall: Happy with purchase, reliable phone
customer_reviews.author: Dallas1

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old Galaxy
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning the features but this is a really great phone, took a lot of vacation pictures with the camera and listen to music but the sound stream does pause at times. Good for reading MySword and Kindle app.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works brilliantly on T-mobile. Compared to the husband's S4, it's nearly as good, and way less expensive. Camera takes great pictures, Swype keyboard responds well, nice size, even in a small hard shell case.
customer_reviews.author: Heatheranne

customer_reviews.title: Great for simple-smartphone-lovers
customer_reviews.text: It's my first smartphone and I'm impressed. I especially love the size, the look and the way the phone works. A few quirks I've experienced in the 6 months that I have it: I cannot receive any MMS messages, which is very annoying. Sometimes I'll receive it hours later, and it has a button to download the words, but it doesn't work anyway. At one point, my front camera didn't work for a couple days. Not sure what caused that; it's been fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: GBA

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with current apps and horrible reception everywhere
customer_reviews.text: This phone does not come with SIM card as stated. Charger did not work and the phone gets very hot, quickly. Incompatible with current apps and horrible reception everywhere. Only works decently when connected to wifi and slow even then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am new to smart phones, so my expectations were not too high
customer_reviews.text: I am new to smart phones, so my expectations were not too high. I like the new functionality, but my old phone was more reliable. This phone seems to drop a lot more calls. I've also had problems with the battery. I have to charge it much more often. The battery has been fully charged one day and down to 15% the next morning. I've tried to adjust settings to preserve battery life, but they don't seem to help. I'm not sure if these issues are limited to the Galaxy LIght or if I would have the same issues with all the Galaxy phones.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Wood

customer_reviews.title: I Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't upgraded my phone in years. I really love the phone. It has made my texting ability soar. I am still learning the phone, but I love everything I have discovered about the phone. I recommend this phone to anybody. Delivery came as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Lashon Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for its price!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was earlier than anctipated and for its price the phone is great. Just between us, I got Galaxy S4 but I bought this for my daughter. She is happy and I'm happy. It's a very nice phone, really, especially for its prices, but if you want more features, you should try a Galaxy S5 with a hefty price of $660.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge E.

customer_reviews.title: What I love about this is that it is very user friendly ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my father who is a first time android user. What I love about this is that it is very user friendly and is very affordable. I only gave 4 stars because just like most android smartphones, the battery battery life is quite short.
customer_reviews.author: Verna May Briones

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome! I recently bought it for my mother, who is new to touch screen phones & so far it's worked excellent! The phone not only looks very nice, but is easy to learn. It's a great phone for both beginners & advanced users. It has so many features. The touchscreen keys work seamlessly, so you have smooth operation. It also arrived with no cosmetic or software flaws, which is exactly in the condition described as 'New'. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: QTheeIllOne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid should work half way decent! Dont buy!
customer_reviews.author: littlekBIGD

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone. It was for a teenager so it does the job. She likes it so I'm ok with it. I checked it out and it's a pretty good phone for the price and being on the lower end of galaxies.
customer_reviews.author: alexis young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I was using an iPhone 4 that way dying. I was hesitant to switch to this phone, but I am very happy with it. My primary reason for using T-Mobile is the free international roaming. I just returned from visiting 4 countries in Europe and this phone worked perfectly. Occasionally it responds a bit slowly, particularly when switching from camera mode to picture gallery, but that's a minor inconvenience given the price for this phone. Overall, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Britt

customer_reviews.title: really like my cell phone
customer_reviews.text: I am truly, really like my cell phone. well it's actually for my brother. He really likes his cellphone... again, Thank you very much....
customer_reviews.author: Natashia Emma R. Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Phone is OK but battery only lasted 24 hours and ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone is OK but battery only lasted 24 hours and was not used at all.I requested new battery or phone and received information to return the phone.
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value for a SmartPone
customer_reviews.text: Got this phone because we have 2 other Samsung Galaxy Lights in our home. Works great so far. Holds charge for 2 days with normal use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Currie

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far; good size and weight and I like the zoom on the camera. Not really a techie, so I have not yet installed many apps. I don't like that I cannot easily access the program manager to see what apps are open.
customer_reviews.author: Sanderling

customer_reviews.title: Great Basic Phone
customer_reviews.text: Wish they never discontinued this phone. Loved the size and features!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this phone one star because it came with a filthy screen and broken. It won't read a sim card because it's missing a piece. I am returning this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The reception in this phone sometimes isn't the best. A lot of times my text messages have ...
customer_reviews.text: The reception in this phone sometimes isn't the best. A lot of times my text messages have to be resent but for the price, I can't complain too much. Very decent phone.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDMD

customer_reviews.title: The phone works fine but I wish I could adjust the sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: The phone works fine but I wish I could adjust the sensitivity. Sometimes it seems like if I just have my hand or finger close to the screen it will jump to another screen and I have to hit the back button.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on Walmart Family Mobile
customer_reviews.text: Walmart Family mobile customers may need to make an additional call to customer support to complete wireless network setup, however once I got the apn setup it worked great. Great price and a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Had this phone for about 4 months now. Having non stop problems with it not being able to connect to the t mobile network for days at a time. Only useful if on wifi calling. Took it to t mobile store they look it over replaced the sim card nothing fixed it. They recommend sending It to Samsung for repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Kaliel J Robles

customer_reviews.title: Nice Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ten year old son and this is such a nice little phone! Seems like a galaxy 4 mini.. He loves it . It is good for a ten year old kid. No complaints..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal!
customer_reviews.text: This was $240-260 in T-mobile store! ... What a ripoff. I even went back to the store to tell them. They were making faces. Phone is good. It might not be the latest and greatest, but it has most of the new features. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Samsung phone
customer_reviews.text: Samsung great phone really like the size perfect for all my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe R.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for $120
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone for $120. Having issues with the Goggle Map app that shipped with the phone but that is the apps fault not the phone.
customer_reviews.author: James F. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am one happy camper... love love love this cell would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Shoponline14$

customer_reviews.title: She said she wanted one just like it, so I bought her another one
customer_reviews.text: I don't know. Got one for my wife for our anniversary. Some dirtbag kid stole it two days later. She said she wanted one just like it, so I bought her another one. Now she bitches on facebook about how she doesn't know how to use it. I can't win. Kill me now! NOT your fault, Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B. Hale

customer_reviews.title: No LTE and Broken charging port
customer_reviews.text: It DOES NOT give LTE, only 4g. I called T-Mobile and they also confirmed you cannot get LTE with this phone. I can only get 4G. Also, the charger port on my phone is broken, you must constantly wiggle the cord for it to charge. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Goldy g.

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smart phone and I am so delighted that I choose the Galaxy light.It was a little learning experience to use it but still easier then I thought.I highly recommend this phone and system.
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: God this phone for my 74 year old mother who has never had a smart phone before. Is very simple and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: cm77

customer_reviews.title: great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Is a Great phone for the price. has glitches but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Built For Speed Design

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Still learning everything there is to know ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Still learning everything there is to know about it.
customer_reviews.author: babzie c

customer_reviews.title: Nice start up phone
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheap phone with the basics. But it runs fine for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda S. Laboy

customer_reviews.title: I take very good care of my phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is only 1.5 years old and it died on me. I take very good care of my phone. It's obviously not made well. Do not make the same mistake I did. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Bfante

customer_reviews.title: It's a great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone for the price, it does lag sometimes when running too many apps at the same time. This phone is like a bullet, I dropped it so many times it seems that is immune! In the nut shell for the amout of money you will be spending its worth it, but it's not top notch
customer_reviews.author: Elie maalouf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pre-teen daughter. Hard to find a case for though.
customer_reviews.author: Beautifulmind

customer_reviews.title: To fix it it cost around 50 dollars and this phone now only cost like 80 so not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The phone lasted 1 year but it started giving problem into six months. It kept freezing up and after one year the charging pin inside the phone doesn't work. To fix it it cost around 50 dollars and this phone now only cost like 80 so not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: shu the man

customer_reviews.title: Great little phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was awesome till I stepped in the spa with it still in my pocket. Boo!
customer_reviews.author: Mert Erel

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad
customer_reviews.text: so far, so good. I like it, have had it for two weeks. The keyboard is small so my words dont always type out correctly. other then that no issues.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ediger

customer_reviews.title: Nice smart phone for older person
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen and so far my mom is loving it. The only thing she wishes it was a little louder
customer_reviews.author: LD23

customer_reviews.title: Great phone FINALLY
customer_reviews.text: Great phone easy to use nice size no overly big fits in my back pocket
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R.

customer_reviews.title: Underrated phone.  It's a Mini!
customer_reviews.text: This unit is basically a S3/S4 mini. My brother has a S3 and I have used a S4 active and this is right there just smaller. If you need a starter phone or one to buy for Tmobile then this is a good choice. Has only 6 gig usable but you can put in a micro sd card to expand memory. Has wifi calling and gets LTE on Tmobile
customer_reviews.author: J. G

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for a friend who loved it! They didn't want a phone with a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend who loved it! They didn't want a phone with a screen that was too big; it was the perfect size and capabilities. Additionally, they were able to use their old SIM card which was important to retain their information.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with Samsung Galaxy Light phone
customer_reviews.text: Never had a smart phone before. Sometimes the battery doesn't last more than about 12 or 15 hours, even with me hardly using it at all, It developed a bunch of spots on the front of the screen, under the glass. I can still read everything, but this is not right.
customer_reviews.author: Don De Vries

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: It's a good phone but I do wish it was a bit bigger. Has lots of useful stuff on it, I'm still finding things on it I didn't know existed...Good upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Linda Morris

customer_reviews.title: This phone can be a little glitchy and their is ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone can be a little glitchy and their is a lag when clicking on an app, link, or scrolling. If your looking for a simple phone that can carry you through for the meantime or your next upgrade, this is it!!
customer_reviews.author: BadGallroro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smartphone & it's fun and learn all I can do.
customer_reviews.author: roses

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Im really happy with the product,i got it on time,it works exellent,,im thinking to get another,Not to big ,Not to small perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Yeyi

customer_reviews.title: A good phone if you have patience
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a good alternative to those other "CONTINENT" sized phones Samsung has to offer. Too bad they couldnt put the same processor in it as the galaxy s4. Its shows the occasional lag but a quick restart can cure that.

customer_reviews.title: A good phone at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: A good phone at a reasonable price. It will not replace you laptop or tablet, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Joe

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: The memory is the problem. It won't even load my pictures when I choose gallery. Other than that, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Camaret

customer_reviews.title: Good little phone with great specs.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone as a backup phone and have enjoyed using it so far. The only thing that i don't like is the Samsung Touchwiz interface. I bypassed that by installing HoloLauncher HD and now it has a snappy stock android feel. This phone also get fast LTE speeds and has slot for a micro sd card.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Zanka

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of using expensive phones on an expensive service (Nexus/Rezound on Verizon) and decided to try T-Mobile and the Light out. This phone (while not a Nexus) is awesome. It's cheap enough to be "disposable" in case it breaks, it runs smooth, the battery lasts me all day with regular use w/ wifi on all day (some days 54% by end of day), and it's the perfect size. I'm also what you'd consider an "expert" user, considering I write android apps. The only con with the phone is the camera... it's decent, but not awesome. Do yourself a favor and save a ton of money. I'm sure you'll love this phone like I have.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Solid phone for the price. Nice features, fast and good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Hunter

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: If you don't need all those extra frills, this can't be beat for the price. It doesn't have a ton of memory but again works great. Everything I need in a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Marques

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase so far. I wanted an affordable unlocked phone that would fit my needs, and it has exceeded my expectations. It does everything a smartphone should, at a very affordable price. I looked at older (used) versions of other phones that were top of the line (or close to it) a couple or so years back, but decided to get something with more current technology. I think I made the right choice, as it won't age as quickly over time (in a relative sense). I don't need or want the extra bells and whistles that come with a more costly phone, and this has been just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Good performance at a relatively lower cost
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my existing phone stopped working. I have to say that this is an excellent phone with a good battery life and offers good performance at a relatively lower cost. Will definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav

customer_reviews.title: I love this android phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this android phone. It's small and fits in my pocket...thats exactly what I wanted. Display is sharp and bright. Holds up to a 64Gb sdcard! Most smartphones are too big for that npw...the only downside of the small size is a small battery. Of you keep ot aynchronizing and with the wifi and blietootj, I have to charge every night and at noon at work, but its not a problem for me. Moght have to get an extea nattery & charhwr for when im out of charge areas.

customer_reviews.text: It has more features than what I am use to. Very easy to handle and easy to set up. Nice size screen.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Light Smartphone SGH-T399 - Brown (T-Mobile)
product_meta.description: The Galaxy Light will give you more ways to connect both to it and with the outside world. S Voice turns your phone into your personal assistant and responds to every voice command. GPS Navigation turns your phone into an invaluable travel partner. Bluetooth technology connects you to hands-free kits, headsets, keyboards and more. Have access to both personal and corporate email. And with full Google Mobile services integration, you have access to voice search and Google Talk. You’ll feel you’ve never been so connected to a phone before.
feature_bullets: 4" Touchscreen, 5 Megapixel Camera, Front Facing Camera, LED flash
Storage Capacity 8 GB, Up to 32 GB Expandable Memory
GPS with Navigation Capability, Conference Calling, 3.5mm Audio Jack, USB Tethering, WiFi Calling and Much more
Compatible with T-Mobile ONLY. T-Mobile SIM card not included.
